content: Economists? We know who they work for. See the review by Robert David Steele Vivas of “Economists and the Powerful: Convenient Theories, Distorted Facts, Ample Rewards” 2012 by Norbert Häring and Niall Douglas https://www.amazon.com/review/R29A4LCFL8PXQD/ref=cm_cr_dp_title?ie=UTF8&ASIN=0857284592&channel=detail-glance&nodeID=283155&store=booksalso see “Give it your best shot” — Glenn Hubbard (from Inside Job)
